EmailTemplate.name: 02-01-22 DBNK D3 Campaign Email 1.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Experts Make Banking Predictions for 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Shifting consumer expectations. Widespread staffing shortages. Technology acceleration. These factors are putting massive pressure on banks and credit unions to digitize and automate their experiences. And all while delivering exceptional service with fewer resources. Industry experts reveal how these circumstances have influenced the financial services industry by sharing their banking predictions for 2022. Want to see how your strategy aligns? Read the latest issue of Accelerate <[[https://online.fliphtml5.com/kyvvb/wdyx/#p=1]]>, NCR’s digital-first magazine. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
